description:
An exorcist visits an eerie abandoned school building, long forgotten.
Within lurks an evil spirit, Hanako-san.. A big breasted, thick thigh school girl that gained some insane spiritual powers!
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: The Mysterious "Hanako-san of the Toilet"! A Huge-Breasted Corrupted Girl Wearing a Supender Skirt
怪奇『トイレの花子さん』! 悪堕ち巨乳の吊りスカート
